title: Customizing Matplotlib Axis Direction
description: Matplotlib is a popular data visualization library in Python. It provides a wide variety of options for customizing plots and charts. In this lab, we will explore how to set the axis direction in Matplotlib using the mpl_toolkits.axisartist module.
